text: Currently working with a MySQL Cursor that is Selecting everything from a MySQL Table. I am trying to convert a the TextCursor object to Arrow.Table but it continues to fail - I expected it to use the Tables interface similar to DataFrames where I could simple wrap the Cursor around a DataFrame Object. How do I properly convert a MySQL Table to an Arrow.Table? Thank you!
